Fun and somewhat addicting game, climbing the ranks. Lots of gameplay variety, many perk and item combinations etc.

Honestly go buy Evil Dead or wait for another asymmetrical game too come out. This game just lost something that used to make it so fun. I do not even think it is one thing. A combination of things over the past year have just made me lose interest. A new interesting asymmetrical game that is coming out within the next year is The Texas Chainsaw Massacre. I hope that can bring some fresh air into this genre of gaming.

This game has become riddled with hackers. They have always been an issue but since the Resident Evil dlc they have become much more frequent and BHVR refuses to address or even acknowledge the issue.

Edit: There was a major issue with ddos on both test and live servers during testing of portrait of a murder. The devs address this but still yet to say or do anything about hacking in game.

Edit 2: Everything I have said still stands, the devs have continued to be vague with future plans, refuse to talk about all issues with the game regardless of the type of issue and are slowly balancing this game for low level survivor sided favoritism. All while saying changes requested by the community are just too much work to make.

Dead by daylight es un juego que se disfruta tanto manejando al asesino como sufriendo con los superiviventes. Ambos bandos est√°n bien nivelados, es decir, que en una partida que haya de igual nivel superviviente y asesino la partida va a ser interesante. A todas las personas que les guste el genero Slasher les recomiendo el juego.
Un punto negativo que se puede rescatar de esto es que, hay ciertos mapas que dan mucha ventaja a los killers, como tambien hay mapas que dan ventaja a los survivors.

Juego dinamico, repetitivo por momentos, pero esa es la esencia del juego.

Juego Recomendado.
